p.s: Bianca L.(18 years old) takes part in aan education center in India.
Bianca volunteers at the Education Center in Delhi, India.

Every day in her week she goes by the Rikscharickshaw to the Education Center where she teachteaches Indian kids English grammar from 10:30 to 11:30 or to 12:00 she teachsteaches the boys and from 14:00 to 16:00 the girls.
She says she likes it to see the kids because they are so interested in learning something and they show so much respect to her.
She is so perplexed, she says, that all the kids have very much fun in spite of having bad destiny, so she volunteers and havehas a good experience with kids.
